metadata.title: CVE-2019-20805 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
p_lx_elf.cpp in UPX before 3.96 has an integer overflow during unpacking via crafted values in a PT_DYNAMIC segment.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20805` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

upx-ucl - 3.96-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.96-2').
